mapper.insert: insert into book (bookName, publishId, createDate,pic) values (#{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{pic})
mapper.select: select b.*,pub.* from book b,publish pub where b.publishId = pub.pubId
mapper.update: update book set bookName= #{bookName},publishId = #{publishId},createDate = #{createDate},pic = #{pic} where bookId = #{bookId}
